TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EfxFilterType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Filter type definitions to be used with EfxFilteri.FilterType.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxFilterType Bandpass = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Currently not implemented. A band-pass filter is used to remove high and low frequency content from a signal.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxFilterType Highpass = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Currently not implemented. A high-pass filter is used to remove low frequency content from a signal.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxFilterType Lowpass = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A low-pass filter is used to remove high frequency content from a signal.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxFilterType Null = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No Filter, disable. This Filter type is used when a Filter object is initially created.
